snippet.title: Barheim - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Are you ready for an epic adventure? Where each level brings in a new challenge and story to tell. 

Barheim is a brewing simulation game and a single-player time management tower defense game, where you become the Barkeep of the most famous tavern in the Norse realms!
Coming soon on STEAM. Make sure to check out our socials for more updates.

#duskwavearts #Barheim #indiegame #gamedevelopment #game #gamer #STEAM #art #gametrailers #trailer #gamerlife
